the para is copied up to the middle of edfr20125_00052_10 by the main scribe: then, a new hand, using a reference sign, copied in the right margin the remaining section of the para. The same hand erased the two last lines copied by the main hand and rewrote them
Por q[uo]i on en a parle

The main scribe (by his mistake or following an erroneous model) does not include the text between edfr20125_00052_10 and the end of para 60. The end of para 52 has been added in the right margin by a further hand; the para 54-60 heve been added by a third hand in the left margine, then in right side of the bottom margin, and then (as indicated by a reference sign) in the left side of the bottom margin. We don't know if para 53 wasn't available to this scribes or if they decided to neglect it (maybe because of its metatextual content, in order to save space?)
